name: 六面∞臂（Rokumenhappi）
description:
This game is a puzzle game born from dice.
If the faces change, the way you play will change; if the number of faces increases, the ways you can play will increase.
Please fully enjoy the world of Rokumen Happy.

how to play

Aim for the goal on the board while rolling Rokumen with six different faces.
Each face has its own characteristics, so use them to overcome obstacles on the board!
There is no single path to the goal, and you can play with free operations.
Once you have cleared the stage, try playing with the shortest number of moves.

Rokumen


If you rotate it on a flat surface, the position of your face will change.
Each of the six faces has different characteristics,
Something with rules like dice that everyone knows.

faces


Happy face, angry face, disgusted face, sad face, surprised face, fearful face
Each face has different characteristics, such as eliminating obstacles, counting down, being chased by enemies, etc.
